original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=4 AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 15:56:19' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-03-07 16:05:24' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount<=100 AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2009-02-03 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views<=160 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 12:58:30' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-07-12 20:08:07' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.AnswerCount AS INTEGER) <= 4 AND posts.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 15:56:19'

CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 160 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 12:58:30' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-07-12 20:08:07')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E6.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-03-07 16:05:24'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E6E5.Id=E3.RelatedPostId)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 100 AND (CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2009-02-03 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 00:00:00')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E6E5E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E6E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E6E5E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E6E5E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E6E5E3E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E6E5E3E4.Id)
